tasks.check:size: deno task build && deno run -A scripts/check-bundle-size.mjs
tasks.assets:optimize: deno run -A npm:svgo src/assets/networks/*.svg src/assets/coins/*.svg src/assets/providers/*.svg
tasks.assets: deno task assets:sync && deno task assets:optimize
tasks.test: deno task test:unit && deno task test:e2e
tasks.test:unit: deno test -A --no-check src/collections/Actors.spec.ts src/collections/ActorCoins.spec.ts src/collections/RoomPeers.spec.ts src/collections/SharedAddresses.spec.ts src/collections/SiweChallenges.spec.ts src/collections/Verifications.spec.ts src/collections/UniswapPools.spec.ts src/collections/UniswapPositions.spec.ts src/collections/SwapQuotes.spec.ts src/lib/bridge/txStatus.spec.ts src/api/voltaire.spec.ts src/api/identity-resolve.spec.ts src/api/etherscan.spec.ts src/api/blockscout.spec.ts src/api/openchain.spec.ts src/api/fourbyte.spec.ts && deno run -A npm:vitest run
tasks.test:e2e:prompt: deno run -A npm:@playwright/test test e2e/prompt-input.test.ts -c playwright.no-server.config.ts
